headline: Companies
text.1:
This visualisation shows how many companies receive data and which industries those companies operate in.

It might be surprising to see this data end up in industries that users would not expect. Those industries often provide a hint about the actual or additional business model behind a service.
text.2: Here you can see if data from interactions with (featured company) will be shared with companies in a particular industry e.g. Advertising/ Marketing.
